articles.title: West hits out at Taliban over ‘summary killings’, enforced disappearances in Afghanistan - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Western countries, including the US, the European Union, Canada and Britain, said they will continue to measure the Taliban by their actions. | World News
articles.content: The United States and other western nations have hit out at the Taliban over reported summary killings and enforced disappearances of former members of the Afghan security forces. The West, including… [+1873 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Winfield and Derek Gatopoulos
articles.title: In democracy's birthplace, Pope Francis warns of populist threats - CTV News
articles.description: Pope Francis warned Saturday that the 'easy answers' of populism and authoritarianism threaten democracy in Europe and called for fresh dedication to promoting the common good.
articles.content:
